game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game of Settlers of Catan.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description

      Getter for the tradeProperty that is needed to bind trade in GameController
      javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<Player> winner
      Getter for the property wrapping the player who won the game.

    • Method Detail

      • giveControlToNextPlayer

        public void giveControlToNextPlayer()
        Sets the next Player to be the active player. Additionally calls on the setRoundCount method to maybe update the roundCount.
        See Also:
        Player

      • increaseRoundCount

        public void increaseRoundCount()
        Increases the round counter by one.

      • haveAllPlayersDeclinedTheTrade

        public boolean haveAllPlayersDeclinedTheTrade()
        Determines if all Players who can decline the Trade have done so.
        Returns:
        true, if the number of Players who declined the Trade reaches the maximum number of player who could decline the trade . false, otherwise.

      • getNextPlayer

        public Player getNextPlayer()
        Returns the Player whose turn it is, if the active player ends their turn.
        Returns:
        the next active Player.

      • getPrevousPlayer

        public Player getPrevousPlayer()
        Returns the Player whose turn it was before the current turn.
        Returns:
        the previously active Player.

      • getPlayerWithMostPointsOtherThan

        public Player getPlayerWithMostPointsOtherThan(Player looser)
        Returns the Player who has the most victory points apart from the loosing player.
        Parameters:
        looser - the Player who lost the game.
        Returns:
        the player with the most points.

      • getPreviousPlayerId

        public int getPreviousPlayerId()
        Return the id of player whose id it is previous id of the current player, and set this player as activePlayer in game
        Returns:
        previousPlayerId
